entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
